a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: MDG1.A: Share of population in extreme poverty, 1990 to 2015
Millennium Development Goal (MDG1.A) was to halve the share of people in developing regions living in extreme
poverty from 1990 levels by 2015. Extreme poverty was defined in the MDGs by the previous international poverty
line of $1.25 per day (adjusted for cross-country differences).

text.textPath: Target: halve the share of people (to 23.5%) living in extreme poverty
Target: halve the share of people (to 23.5%) living in extreme poverty

text.tspan: Data source: MDG Final Evaluation (UN MDG Report)
